starDescription: Get a random starred message from the database or the star leaderboard.

explainedUsage: Whether to show a random starred message, or the most starred message.
Only get starred message from the specified user. Defaults to any user.
Only get starred message in the past given amount of time. Defaults to any time. For example 5d for the past 5 days.
starExtended.extendedHelp: This command shows a random starred message or the starboard usage and leaderboard for this server.

starNoChannel: I'm sorry, but a starboard channel hasn't been set up.
